channel.title: Changing death point!
channel.description: Alright, so you know how you can change where you start? I was wondering if someone could guide me how to change where I return when I die. I have pimpscape and when I die, I go back to the bank, I want to change the position of where I end up to when I die. Can someone post a mini-tut on how to change that? Thanks!

item.title: Changing death point!
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

Search for this in ur player.java

// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet

in player.java. It should look like this:

  // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
  teleportToX = 3254;//3072;
  teleportToY = 3420;//3312;

and change the cords to where u wana die/spawn/start

Read full topic
